examples.example: 办公室的打印机一直在高效地为大家服务。

translate.english: The printer in the office has been serving everyone efficiently all the time.

examples.example: 我新买的打印机工作起来又快又好，帮了我很大的忙。

translate.english: The newly bought printer of mine works fast and well, and has helped me a lot.

examples.example: 那台打印机吐出的纸张上印满了清晰漂亮的字迹。

translate.english: The paper spit out by that printer is printed full of clear and beautiful handwriting.
